results.name: Difference of sums of digits of n in ternary and in binary.
comment: This sequence is positive on average, since 1/log 3 > 1/log 4. Do all integers appear infinitely often? - _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Feb 07 2013
link: R. Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
